title: World Day against the Death Penalty 2015 (Amnesty International Australia)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International Australia ) The death penalty continues to be used as a tool in the so-called 'war on drugs', with an alarming number of states across the globe executing people convicted on drug-related charges, in clear
